_meanings:
{@--2@} To march
against, invade; <ls>Ms. 7. 183.</ls>

{@--3@} To
go to, march towards, set out for
(with <ab>acc.</ab>, <ab>dat.</ab> or with {#prati#}).
{@--7@} To last.

{@--8@} To
happen, come to <ab>pass.</ab>

{@--9@} To go or
be reduced to any state, be or 
become (usually with the <ab>acc.</ab> of 
abstract noun).

{@--11@} To have carnal 
intercourse with.

{@--12@} To request,
implore.
{@--13@} To find out, discover.

{@--14@} To behave, act. (The meanings
of {#yA#}, like those of {#gam#}, are variously
modified according to the noun
with which it is connected; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%}
{#nASaM yA#} to be destroyed; {#vAcyatAM yA#} to
incur blame or censure; {#laGutAM yA#} to
be slighted; {#prakftiM yA#} to regain one's
natural state; {#nidrAM yA#} to fall asleep;
{#vaSaM yA#} to submit, go into one's 
possession; {#udayaM yA#} to rise; {#astaM yA#} to
set, decline; {#pAraM yA#} to reach the
other side of, to master, surmount,
get over; {#padaM yA#} to attain to the 

position of; {#agre yA#} to go before,
take the lead, lead; {#aDo yA#} to
sink; {#viparyAsaM yA#} to undergo a
change, to be changed in 
appearance; {#SirasA mahIM yA#} to bend the
head down to the ground &c.),

{@--1@} To cause to
go or proceed.

{@--4@} To live or spend
time with; <ls>Ki. 2. 45.</ls>

{@--5@} To 
support, nourish.

To wish to go, to be about to go &c.
--WITH {#ati#} {1} to go beyond, 
transgress, violate. {2} to surpass.
